conbody.p: This tab is used for recording the working process. The provided input fields are the following:

ul.li:
Line count: Enter the modus of the text's line count (e.g. define how the lines are counted in your text).
NOTE: Line count only applies to the item-type "text".
Protocol: Enter the dates of your working process here (e.g. first entering, editing etc.).

Description: This input field offers the oportunity to provide a more thorough definition of the (physical) object / text in case the name of the database object is not sufficient for identification. Usualy this field remains blank.
NOTE: This does not replace conscientious naming of the database and proper filling of the passport data.
Comment: Write any additional comments you may have to your work.
